Description: Commuters Dream! Sunny and spacious 2 bedroom, 1 bathroom home minutes from the Mass Pike. This unbelievable property was recently renovated, featuring a new Chef's Kitchen with white shaker cabinets, quartz countertops, white textured backsplash, and stainless steel appliances and dishwasher. The spa-like bathroom is adorned with custom tile work and boasts a large, walk-in shower. Hardwood floors throughout, and a shared back patio space to enjoy. This rental opportunity conveniently includes in-unit washer/dryer, one off-street parking space, snow shoveling and removal services, and additional on-street parking spaces for non-winter months. This location is perfect for commuting downtown and accessing the local express bus. Moments from Stop & Shop, CVS, Trader Joe's, Oliva's Bistro, Buff's Pub, and other great restaurants in both Arsenal Yards and Newton. No pets allowed per condo association. Commuters Dream!
